title: Clean Bottle
subtitle: Machine learning based PET recycling
task: Developing the cnn model using tensorflow
content: To solve the problem of the environment where plastic bottles are not easily recycled in Korea, we came up with and implemented the idea of a recycling vending machine with machine learning that automatically identifies plastic bottles with labels and contents, creating 99.9% accurate models and prototypes using Arduino.
